creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: male figure in gray and white striped kimono grabs the wrist of a young female attendant who was handing him a red dish; other young women and geisha serve tea, play instruments, and dance around the man; small feast in front of man on ground, including large red snapper; scene takes place on a green dock over water
marks:
Signature and Seal

 LRC: 豊廣画 {Toyohiro ga} [Painted by Toyohiro]
title: Summer Party on the Bank of the Kamo River
